title: Anthropic Releases Claude 4.5 Family of Models
summary: Anthropic has launched the Claude 4.5 model family, featuring improved reasoning capabilities and a larger context window. The models show significant advances in code generation and multi-step problem solving.

title: New Research Shows LLMs Can Self-Verify Mathematical Proofs
summary: A team of researchers demonstrates that large language models can verify the correctness of mathematical proofs with 94% accuracy, potentially revolutionizing automated theorem proving.

title: Google DeepMind Announces Gemini 3.0 with Enhanced Multimodal Reasoning
summary: Google DeepMind unveils Gemini 3.0, featuring improved visual understanding and real-time video analysis. The model can process hour-long videos and answer detailed questions about their content.
